languages.text: Рев этого существа наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем противникам вокруг. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Рев этого существа наносит урон всем противникам вокруг. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:Test}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g}.

languages.text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.
languages.original_text: Рев этого существа наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем противникам вокруг. Цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The creature's roar deals damage to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物的咆哮会对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的咆哮会对周围所有敌人造成伤害。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态。

languages.text: 生物の咆哮は周囲のすべての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を合格しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}する。
languages.original_text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 生物の咆哮で、周囲の敵すべてにダメージを付与。ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を合格しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: El rugido de la criatura causa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todos los enemigos que la rodeen. Los objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedarán {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El rugido de la criatura causa daño a todos los enemigos que la rodeen. Los objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedarán {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g}.

languages.text: Das Gebrüll der Kreatur fügt allen Gegnern um sie herum {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Die Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Gebrüll der Kreatur fügt allen Gegnern um sie herum Schaden zu. Die Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, sonst werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.

languages.text: Le rugissement de la créature inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à tous les ennemis qui l'entourent. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le rugissement de la créature inflige des dégâts à tous les ennemis qui l'entoure. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}.

languages.text: Yaratığın kükreyişi, çevredeki tüm düşmanlara {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature's roar deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies around it. The targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}.
